_comment: bench-03 file generation. Only SafeController produces a component file. Directives are behaviors only.

_engine_failure_modes.risk_bleeding: If SafeController is MANUAL, TemplateBindingRiskRule is incorrectly contaminating based on directives in same file
_engine_failure_modes.directive_detection: modalDirective must have has_compile=true AND transclude=true set on RawDirective
